sqls.sqlElement: SELECT T.CNSTTP as cnstTp, T.CNSTCODE as cnstCode, T.CNSTNAME as cnstName, T.CREATETIME as createTime,T.EDIT_TIME as editTime FROM CHN_CNST T WHERE T.DEL = 0 AND T.CNSTTP = :cnstTp #if ($cnstCode && $cnstCode != '') AND T.CNSTCODE =:cnstCode #end #if ($cnstName && $cnstName != '') AND T.CNSTNAME LIKE '%'||:cnstName||'%' #end ORDER BY T.CREATETIME DESC

SELECT T.CNSTTP as cnstTp, T.CNSTCODE as cnstCode, T.CNSTNAME as cnstName, T.CREATETIME as createTime ,T.EDIT_TIME as editTime FROM CHN_CNST T WHERE T.DEL = 0 AND T.CNSTTP = :cnstTp #if ($cnstCode && $cnstCode != '') AND T.CNSTCODE =:cnstCode #end #if ($cnstName && $cnstName != '') AND T.CNSTNAME =:cnstName #end ORDER BY T.CREATETIME DESC
